  • Method Details

    • getRootLayoutUncloned

      protected Layout getRootLayoutUncloned()
      Gets an uncloned reference to the root of this, this makes some protected class methods faster.

    • getRootLayout

      public Layout getRootLayout()
      Returns a clone of the root layout by following the parent field from this layout.

    • getParent

      public LayoutNode getParent()
      Returns a clone of this parent.

    • isAllowedToBeChildOf

      protected abstract boolean isAllowedToBeChildOf(LayoutNode layoutNode)
      Checks whether this layout is allowed to be added as a child of the given LayoutNode

    • deleteCharacter

      public abstract void deleteCharacter()
      Calls deleteCharacter on the FileBufferView contained in the active LayoutLeaf under this node, if there is one.

    • closeActive

      public abstract int closeActive()
      Calls close on the FileBufferView contained in the active LayoutLeaf under this node, if there is one. Returns 1 if there was an error (the buffer was dirty) or 0 otherwise. Returns 2 if the deleted leaf had no parent (was the last file open)
      Returns:

    • clearContent

      public abstract void clearContent() throws IOException
      Calls clearContent on the contained FileBufferView(s).
      Throws:
      IOException

    • renderContent

      public abstract void renderContent() throws IOException
      Calls renderContent() on the contained FileBufferView(s).
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteLeftLeaf

      protected abstract void deleteLeftLeaf()
      Deletes the leftmost LayoutLeaffrom the underlying structure. In composite Layouts it is relayed to the leftmost child. If this is a leaf, it itself deletes itself from the parent.

    • setParent

      protected void setParent(LayoutNode layoutNode)
      Sets parent field of this to provided node.

    • getContainsActiveView

      public boolean getContainsActiveView()
      Returns whether this layout contains an active view somewhere under it, either directly or as a child deeper.

    • moveFocus

      public abstract void moveFocus(DIRECTION dir) throws RuntimeException
      Makes next/previous view in the structure active according to dir (left/right).
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • moveCursor

      public abstract void moveCursor(char c)
      Calls moveCursor() on the contained active FileBufferView(s).

    • enterText

      public abstract void enterText(byte b)
      Calls enterText() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active.

    • saveActiveBuffer

      public abstract int saveActiveBuffer()
      Calls save() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active.
      Returns:

    • makeLeftmostLeafActive

      protected abstract void makeLeftmostLeafActive()
      Sets containsActive of the left leaf of the subtree with this as root and all the nodes inbetween to true.

    • makeRightmostLeafActive

      protected abstract void makeRightmostLeafActive()
      Sets containsActive of the right leaf of the subtree with this as root and all the nodes inbetween to true.

    • renderCursor

      public abstract void renderCursor() throws IOException
      Calls renderCursor() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active. Should be called after all the Termios prints are done to ensure a correct cursor position.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • enterInsertionPoint

      public abstract void enterInsertionPoint()
      Calls enterInsertionPoint() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active.

    • rotateRelationshipNeighbor

      public abstract Layout rotateRelationshipNeighbor(ROT_DIRECTION rotdir)
      Rotates the active layoutLeaf under this structure if there is one with its right neighbor if there is one, clockwise or counterclockwise according to rotdir. If the right neighbor is a direct sibling it rotates to stand perpendicular to the current orientation of the parent. If there is no direct right sibling it is added to the parent of the active leaf and rotated then.

    • getLeftLeaf

      protected abstract LayoutLeaf getLeftLeaf()
      Returns a direct reference to the leftmost LayoutLeaf under this tree.

    • setContainsActiveView

      protected void setContainsActiveView(boolean active)
      Set containsactiveview to the given value.

    • forcedCloseActive

      public abstract int forcedCloseActive()
      Calls forcedCloseActive() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active. Returns 0 if close was succesful and 2 if close was succesful but there are no more other children.

    • equals

      public abstract boolean equals(Object obj)
      Returns whether this Layout and the given object are equals in contents
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object

    • clone

      public abstract Layout clone()
      Returns a clone of this Layout, without any references to it
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
